abstract: He'll be running a restaurant and hotel, Topping Rose House, in the former Bull's Head Inn in Bridgehampton.
lead_paragraph: A venerable white mansion on a corner in Bridgehampton, which at one time was the Bull's Head Inn, is being restored and turned into a 22-room hotel and spa, Topping Rose House, with a year-round restaurant by Tom Colicchio, whose organization will also run the hotel. Mr. Colicchio said the focus of the restaurant will probably be vegetables. A late summer opening is anticipated.

headline.main: Colicchio Is Coming to the Hamptons
